s_synopsis: Enter a medieval era in a mystical world where Ivanhoe, our chivalrous hero, pursues a perilous quest... a quest from which most mortals would flee... an adventure which most men would fear! Strap on your armor, take up your sword and brace yourself to face the magical powers of the most evil of wizards, plunderous pirates, the most awesome of dragons and a host of hideous beings in this land of legends. Superb animation of cartoon quality and beautifully executed graphics create a visual impact unrivalled in the media of interactive entertainment. Ivanhoe - Fight for your life... and legend!
